mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.auction_id, t1.auto_auction_id, t1.car_id, t1.auction_code, t1.auction_status, t1.sort, t1.create_person, t1.create_time, t2.car_auto_no, t2.auto_info_name, t4.license_number, t3.starting_price, t3.reserve_price, t4.begin_register_date, t2.source_type, t2.auction_num, t2.publish_user_name, t2.store_name from car_locale_auction_car t1 left join car_auto t2 on t1.car_id=t2.id left join car_auto_auction t3 on t3.id=t1.auto_auction_id left join car_auto_info_detail t4 on t4.auto_id=t2.id where t1.auction_id = #{auctionId} order by t1.sort
select max(t1.sort) from car_locale_auction_car t1 where t1.auction_id = #{auction_id}

select t1.id, t1.auction_id, t1.auto_auction_id, t1.car_id, t1.auction_code, t1.auction_status, t1.sort, t1.create_person, t1.create_time, t2.car_auto_no, t2.auto_info_name, t4.license_number, t3.starting_price, t3.reserve_price, t4.begin_register_date, t2.source_type, t2.auction_num, t2.publish_user_name from car_locale_auction_car t1 left join car_auto t2 on t1.car_id=t2.id left join car_auto_auction t3 on t3.id=t1.auto_auction_id left join car_auto_info_detail t4 on t4.auto_id=t2.id where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.car_id, t1.auto_auction_id, t1.auction_code, t1.auction_status, t1.auction_id, t2.title , t3.auto_info_name, t3.main_photo, t3.car_auto_no, t1.sort , t5.begin_register_date, t5.license_number, t5.mileage, t5.use_nature_cn as use_nature, t4.if_agent, t4.starting_price, t4.agent_price, t4.service_price from car_locale_auction_car t1 left join car_locale_auction t2 on t1.auction_id=t2.id left join car_auto t3 on t3.id=t1.car_id left join car_auto_auction t4 on t4.id=t1.auto_auction_id left join car_auto_info_detail t5 on t5.auto_id=t1.car_id where t1.auction_id=#{auctionId} ORDER BY t1.sort
select count(t1.id) from car_locale_auction_car t1 where t1.sort <= #{sort} and t1.auction_id=#{auctionId}
